ThingDef.label: Russian Nagant M1895 Revolver
ThingDef.description: An old pattern double-action revolver used during WW2. It's not very powerful, but it has a decent range for a pistol and is quick on the draw. It works quite well on deserters.

ThingDef.label: Russian TT-33 Pistol
ThingDef.description: An old pattern blowback-operated self-loading pistol used during WW2. It lacks stopping power and range, but is quick to fire..

ThingDef.label: Russian Mosin-Nagant Model 1891/30 Rifle
ThingDef.description: A versatile, reliable design of rifle that saw extensive service during WW2. Its range and low fire rate make it great for warfare, or hunting.

ThingDef.label: Russian Mosin-Nagant Model 1891/30 Rifle (Bayonet)
ThingDef.description: A versatile, reliable design of rifle that saw extensive service during WW2. Its range and low fire rate make it great for warfare, or hunting. This one is equipped with a bayonet.

ThingDef.label: Russian SVT-40 Rifle
ThingDef.description: A versatile, reliable design of rifle that saw extensive service during WW2. It fires faster than a bolt-action rifle but maintains the damage and range that would have been lost with a carbine.

ThingDef.label: Russian SVT-40 Rifle (Bayonet)
ThingDef.description: A versatile, reliable design of rifle that saw extensive service during WW2. It fires faster than a bolt-action rifle but maintains the damage and range that would have been lost with a carbine. This one is equipped with a bayonet.

ThingDef.label: Russian PPSh-41 SMG (Stick Mag)
ThingDef.description: A compact, quickly firing weapon used during WW2. It's got a very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well.

ThingDef.label: Russian PPSh-41 SMG (Drum Mag)
ThingDef.description: A compact, quickly firing weapon used during WW2. It's got a very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well.

ThingDef.label: Russian PPS-43 SMG
ThingDef.description: A compact, quickly firing weapon used during WW2. It's got a very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well.

ThingDef.label: Russian DP-27 LMG
ThingDef.description: A gas-operated light machine gun used during WW2. While it is somewhat unwieldy and inaccurate, its bipod and long bursts of fire make it an effective weapon against enemy groups.

ThingDef.label: Russian Fedorov Avtomat Rifle
ThingDef.description: A general-purpose gas-operated automatic rifle used during WW2. It has good stats across the board and was frequently used in field or urban combat.

ThingDef.label: Russian Mosin-Nagant Model 1891/30 Sniper Rifle
ThingDef.description: An old design of precision sniper rifle used during WW2. Its has incredibly long range but because it's so unwieldy, other weapons outclass it at close range.

ThingDef.Name: WW2ServiceSemiAutomaticSniperRifle
ThingDef.label: Russian SVT-40 Sniper Rifle
ThingDef.description: A more versatile design of precision sniper rifle used during WW2. It has incredibly long range and is more versatile than a normal sniper rifle. Because it's so unwieldy, other weapons outclass it at close range.

ThingDef.label: Russian PTRD-41 Anti-Tank Rifle
ThingDef.description: Ancient anti-tank rifle, originally designed for use against primitive armored vehicles. Fires a single shot, very powerful cartridge but the large size and weight make it unwieldy.
